Summary: A star moving in circles right to left and staying still when commercial flights came by blending in with the night sky.
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around September 15th 2010
divs: sighting detailsover highway 60 approx. at the 288 crossing in midlothian va to the west. i was lookin at the stars when one takes off to the right dropded down a bit and circled back to the originale spot. it moved in very fast, short bursts. the light flickerd at times being brighter and duller at other times. i watched on and off for over 2 and a half hours on my third story deck. when commercial flights came through the object would stay moitionless. it was a relativley clear night. it was still there and still "roving" when i decided to go to sleep. if you read this and live in this area look up!! i know it sounds crazy but, on july 3rd 2010 my girlfriend and i saw 2 extreamly bright orange orbs up there heading north towards d.c. we reported that one to the police, *(names deleted--sgonzalez\cms). the next day we was called and told that there was a slew of reports nearly identical to ours that night all up the east coast. i am a skeptic and it bothers me that i cannot explain all this away, but i will not lie to myself or anyone else about what my eyes see for themselves. i will be buying a video recorder this weekend, and i will keep at my side for now on when i go out at night.
